content:
did the folks at Bugzilla tell you only Thunderbird 115 is actually supported? You might link to the bug so someone here is not guessing.

I really have no idea what you are trying to do, but it sounds about as convoluted as it possible could be for no apparent reason, but then I fail to understand what an email alias is, other than a marketing invention of some US based internet access provider.

What filtering in Thunderbird has to do with Zoho also fails me, so it really am struggling with the concepts here.
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
There is no way to re-sort a thread as the location in the thread and order presented is set by the references stored in the message header and has nothing at all to do with date, only which message it is in reply to

Perhaps just turn off threading. https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/message-threading-thunderbird#w_disable-threading-on-a-folder and https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/message-threading-thunderbird#w_changing-default-threading-mode
creator: MattAuSupport
